19.eng-name: The Book of the Prayer for the Two 'Eids

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir bin Samurah said:"I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) delivering the Khutbah standing up, then he sat down for a while and did not speak, then he stood up and delivered another Khutbah. Whoever tells you that the Prophet (ﷺ) delivered a Khutbah sitting do not believe him

chapter.ara-name: باب الْجُلُوسِ بَيْنَ الْخُطْبَتَيْنِ وَالسُّكُوتِ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Sitting between the two Khutbahs and remaining silent while sitting
